title: Create MT5 account
description: This call creates new MT5 user, either demo or real money user.

mainPassword.description: the master password of the account. The password must contain at least two of three types of characters (lower case, upper case and digits) and meet the minimum length requirements set for the group. This field is required.

passthrough.description: [Optional] field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

name.description: Client's name. The maximum length here is 101 characters.

company.description: [Optional] Name of the client's company. The maximum length of the company name is 64 characters.

country.description: [Optional] 2-letter country code (value received from residence_list call).

mt5_account_type.description: Standard: Variable spreads, High leverage. Advanced: Variable spreads, Medium Leverage, more products.

phonePassword.description: the user's phone password. Max length 50.

address.description: [Optional] The address of the user. The maximum length of this address field is 128 characters.

req_id.description: [Optional] field to map request to response

investPassword.description: The investor password of the account. The password must contain at least two of three types of characters (lower case, upper case and digits) and meet the minimum length requirements set for the group. This field is required.
